      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Displays view on start. The following function displays the view when launched from main. It displays the Tamaclonechi GUI interface.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        stage - is Stage object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if it can't be started.

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground(java.lang.String image)
        Sets the background of main. The following function displays the background image of main based on the passed in string name. Has the following backgrounds that can be set: day, night Az, old Main, windows, rooftop, Tokyo and office hours. Removes previous image from main if present.
        Parameters:
        image - is a string to indicate desired image path for background

      • status

        public void status()
        Decides the status of the tamclonechi based on its stats. The following function decides the status of the tamaclonchi by using getters to see where the pet's stats place in terms of the avaible animations. Has the following available status and animations: mad, happy, regular, sad, sick, and annoyed.

      • action

        public void action(java.lang.String cmd)
        The following function plays an action animation based on the passed in command. The following function plays an action animation based on the passed in command, which includes, eat, dance, sleep, medicine, defecate, and sick.
        Parameters:
        cmd - is a string animation command.

      • idle

        public void idle(java.lang.String cmd)
        The following function plays an idle animation based on the passed in command. The following function plays an idle animation based on the passed in command, which includes, regular,annoyed, mad, happy, dead, and sick.
        Parameters:
        cmd - is a string animation command.

      • statBar

        public javafx.scene.control.ToolBar statBar()
        The following function creates the status bar to be displayed at the top of the tamaclonechi GUI view. The following function creates the status bar for the tamaclonechi. It displays three portions the first being an avatar of the tamaclonechi, with the game control buttons below (created by calling the fcn createProfileStat()). The second being a general status of the tamaclonechi with it's name, health, age and weight displayed. The third portion being the tamaclonechi's happiness level.

      • createProfileStat

        public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createProfileStat()
        The following function creates the profileStat portion to be displayed on the status bar. Helper fcn for statBar(..). The following function creates a portion of the status bar, called the profileStatBar. It displays an avatar of the tamaclonechi, with the game control buttons below. The buttons include power, save and settings. This fcn is to be called by the statBar().

      • actionBar

        public javafx.scene.control.ToolBar actionBar()
        The following function creates the action bar to be displayed at the bottom of the tamaclonechi GUI view. The following function creates the action bar for the tamaclonechi. It has the following action buttons feed, sleep, dance, clean and heal. When a button is clicked a TamaclonechiController fcn is called to alter the status of the Tamaclonechi in the model.

      • actionHandler

        public void actionHandler(java.lang.String act,
                          int time)
        The following function handles controller modifications and threading to delay idle animation from playing over action animation. The following function calls the controller fcns to alter the model/pet's stats based on the button pressed. Fcn if only ran if pet is alive and an animation isn't currently active. The fcn also uses threading to delay idle animation from occurring over the action animation. Sets act and time to be used in the run fcn to create time specific delay in animation.
        Parameters:
        act - is the action to play
        actionTime - is the time to factor into to delay of idle animation

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable arg0,
                   java.lang.Object msg)
        The following function updates the view when the model is changed. The following function updates the view when the model is changed. Every time a change is made the function checks if the user selected a new background, updates the tamaclonechi's stats on the status bar, display defecate animation if needed and displays idle animation based off new status.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        arg0 - is a Observable object.
        arg1 - is a object.

      • run

        public void run()
        The following function is a runnable used by the function action handler to handle consequential animation execution and prevent animation overlap. The following function is a runnable used by the function action handler when a new thread is created. Displays action animation by calling the fcn action() with the current action, creates a time delay for animation to finish based on actionTime which duration of the current action in seconds. After delay The action and animationActive globals are then reset for the next action.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
